Class MockModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • MockModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TradeOperation<Stock>

    public class MockModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements TradeOperation<Stock>
    A mock model that uses to test controller and view.

      • buyAmount

        public void buyAmount(java.lang.String portfolioName,
                      java.lang.String stockSymbol,
                      java.time.LocalDate date,
                      double money)
        Description copied from interface: TradeOperation
        Buy a stock at date. If portfolio name is null or empty string, or portfolio name does not exist, or stock symbol is null or empty string, or date is null, this method will throw IllegalArgumentException. This method will buy stocks by given money to use.
        Specified by:
        buyAmount in interface TradeOperation<Stock>
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - given portfolio name
        stockSymbol - given stock symbol
        date - given date
        money - given money
